participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outspoken, Lila has a bold spirit and loves to explore life at full throttle.
participant_1.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head.

participant_2.name: Greg
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and disillusioned, Greg struggles with his current life situation but desires change and freedom.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.
